articles.content: The first three letters of the winning teams name were never in doubt and, from an early stage, neither were the other five. Leicester are supposed to be the toughest beasts the English Premiership h… [+5260 chars]

articles.author: Richard Gibson
articles.title: England captain Ben Stokes confirms Joe Root will return to number four in batting line-up - Daily Mail
articles.description: The new England captain has confirmed his predecessor will return to his familiar position in the batting line-up ahead of June's Test series against New Zealand.
articles.content:
Joe Root will return to the rank and file of Test cricket at number four in the batting order as Ben Stokes stamps his imprint on the England team.
Root surprisingly shunted up a place for his final… [+2528 chars]

articles.author: Callum Wells, Gerard Couzens
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo's partner Georgina Rodriguez reveals they've named their daughter Bella Esmeralda - Daily Mail
articles.description: The footballer's girlfriend, 28, announced the name they had picked alongside a pair of adorable photos which saw the little one sleeping in her cot.
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo and his partner Georgina Rodriguez have named their newborn daughter Bella Esmeralda, the WAG revealed in a Saturday Instagram post.
